issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I just installed the latest launch from Appcelerator saying that it has many new features and name is changed from Titanium Studio to Appcelerator Studio. But unfortunately it is not even starting. My Dell Latitude 3440 Laptop is purchased yesterday. Prior to that I was using HP laptop and everything was working fine on previous version (Titanium Studio). Killed it from Task Manager several times and waited for even 1 hour, but no luck. Studio not even loads and stuck at its splash screen.

Please resolve the issue.

Task Manager Screenshot - http://i.imgur.com/aMX3h1T.png
fields.summary: Newly Launched Appcelerator Studio 4 is not starting on Windows 8.1/i5/8GB RAM
fields.environment:
Dell Latitude 3440
Intel i5
8 GB RAM
500GB HDD
Windows 8.1 Pro
Java Installed by Appcelerator Studio itself

comments.body: Issue resolved. I was using the project folder inside OneDrive. Now I have made it to local.
